bill_title: define the responsibility of the Department of Transportation regarding portions of certain intersecting county and township highways located within the right-of-way of the state highway system.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to define the responsibility of the Department of Transportation regarding portions of certain intersecting county and township highways located within the right-of-way of the state highway system. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 31-24 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: If the Department of Transportation resurfaces or reconstructs a section of state highway, the department shall resurface that portion of any intersecting county or township highway that is within the right-of-way of that section of state highway. Thereafter, the department shall, upon the request of the county or township, supply the necessary surface material for any portion of any intersecting county or township highway that is within the right-of-way of the state highway. The surface material shall be supplied to the county or township. The county or township is responsible for the maintenance of that portion of the county or township highway located within the right-of-way of the state highway. 180 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.063 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
